h2.a: High School Student Council Receives 2020 National Gold Council of Excellence Award

div.p: For the sixth year in a row, the Sauk Rapids-Rice High School student council received the National Gold Council of Excellence Award from the National Student Council for an exemplary record of leadership, service and activities serving to improve school and community. Congratulations, #StormStrong student council members! Photo above: Front row, l to r: Esther Parks, […]

h2.a: There’s a Learning Curve with Distance Learning

div.p: Meagan Simonson, Sauk Rapids resident and parent to Mississippi Heights Elementary first grader, Leo, feels her son’s teachers have gone above and beyond to help with the school district’s transition from a traditional brick-and-mortar school model to one that utilizes distance learning, as mandated by Governor Walz’s March 15 executive order that closed school buildings […]

h2.a: Board of Education Recognizes PV students

div.p: Monday, March 9, Pleasantview students received certificates of excellence from the Sauk Rapids-Rice Public Schools Board of Education. Front row (l to r): James Schultz, Tru Johnson, Savannah Montour, Julianna Skog, and Emileyah Menden. (Not pictured Riley Walters-Andrew.) Back Row (l to r): Superintendent Sinclair, Board of Education Chair Ryan Butkowski and Pleasantview Elementary Principal […]
